, which literally means "Circassian village"), the population of today's Çerkezköy is a mix of typical Thracian locals who are mostly descendants of

Çerkezköy today is a rapidly growing city of drab apartment blocks, surrounded by a diverse range of industries. You will have a hard time for finding a reason to spend time more than absolutely necessary in this place.

In local slang, Çerkezköy is simply known as
, though without giving much thought to its original meaning.
